CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(ApprovalStatus__c) = 'Pending', IMAGE("/resource/1573112823000/TAR_App_Pending", "Approval Pending",20,100), IF( TEXT(ApprovalStatus__c) = 'Approved', IMAGE("/resource/1575458290000/TAR_IMG_Approved", "Approved",30,100), IF( TEXT(ApprovalStatus__c) = 'Rejected', IMAGE("/resource/1575458290000/TAR_IMG_Rejected", "Rejected",45,120), IF( TEXT(ApprovalStatus__c) = 'Not Submitted', IMAGE("/resource/1575458234000/TAR_App_NotSubmitted", "Not Submitted",30,100),IMAGE("/resource/1574351176000/TAR_App_NotSubmitted", "Not Submitted",30,130)))))
CustomField.label: Approval Status
